questions.question: Two wolves have the same proteins for paw size. They have different parents. What can you say about their paw size?

choices.answer: They will have the same paw size since their proteins will connect the same
They will have the same paw size since all wolves have the same paw size
They will have different paw sizes since proteins connect in different ways
They will have different paw sizes because they have different parents

questions.question: Two parrots have different parents. One has red feathers, and the other has yellow feathers. Why are they different?

choices.answer: Each parrot has different colors because they have different parents
Each parrot has different colors because their genes connect differently
The parrots have different alleles, and the genes are different colors
They have different alleles, which make proteins that connect differently

imageMetadata.altText: Macaws perched on branch in jungle

questions.question: A dragonfly has blue wings. Its mother has blue wings, but its father has colorless wings. Why does it have blue wings?

choices.answer: It got one allele from each parent; the genes make proteins that make blue
It got one allele from each parent, and those genes connect to make blue
It got alleles from its mom only, and those genes connect to make blue
It got alleles from its mom only; the genes make proteins that make blue

imageMetadata.altText: Views Of The Isle Of Grain

questions.question: Two frogs have different proteins for tongue length. They have different parents. What can you say about their tongues?

choices.answer: They will have the same tongue length- different proteins connect the same
They will have different tongue lengths because they have different parents
They will have different tongue length-  proteins connect differently
They will have the same tongue length- all frogs have the same length

questions.question: Two rhinoceros beetles have different parents. They have differently shaped horns. Why?

choices.answer: They have different gene versions that make proteins that curve differently
They have different gene versions, and the genes curve differently
Offspring from different parents will have different horn shapes
They have different gene versions that connect together differently

questions.question: A father rabbit had long ears while the mother rabbit had short ears. Why could one of the babies have long ears?

choices.answer: It got alleles from its dad and not its mom-the genes connect long
It got alleles from its dad and not its mom that make proteins for long
It got one allele from each parent that make proteins for long
It got one allele from its dad and one from its mom-the genes connect long

questions.question: Two mice have different parents. They have the same proteins for whisker thickness. What can you say about the whiskers?

choices.answer: All mice have the same whisker thickness
They will be the same because the same proteins will connect the same
They will be different because the same proteins will connect differently
They will be different because they have different parents

questions.question: Two dogs have different parents. One dog has blue eyes, and the other dog has brown eyes. Why?

choices.answer: Offspring from different parents have different eye colors
Different alleles for eye color connect to make different eye colors
Different alleles instruct for different proteins which connect differently
Different alleles for eye color-the genes are different. colors

questions.question: A shark pup has a pointed fin. Its mother also had a pointed fin, but its father had a rounded fin. Why?

choices.answer: One allele from each parent-genes instruct for proteins connected pointed
One allele from each parent-genes connected pointed
It inherited alleles from its mom and not its dad-genes connected pointed
It inherited alleles from its mom and not dad-proteins connected pointed

questions.question: Two birds have different parents. They have different proteins for beak thickness. What can you say about their beaks?

choices.answer: All birds have the same beak thickness
The same beak thickness: different proteins can connect the same
Different beak thickness because they have different parents
Different beak thickness because different proteins connect different ways

questions.question: Two cats have different parents. One cat has stiff fur, and the other cat has soft fur. Why?

choices.answer: They have different genes for fur softness, and one gene is softer
Different genes instruct for different proteins that connect differently
Cats with different parents have different fur softness
Different genes for fur softness connect to make different kinds of fur

questions.question: A father pig has a curly tail while the mother pig has a straight tail. Why could their piglet have a curly tail?

choices.answer: Only alleles from its dad-they instruct for proteins that connect curly
Only alleles from dad-genes connect curly
One allele from each parent-genes connect curly
One allele from each parent-they instruct for proteins that connect curly
